title: Все вместе
overview: All over the world, in all cities, minds, media, screens, the virus is raging. He divided society into skeptics, paranoids, and moderates. It changes the way of life, makes irreversible adjustments to the plans of each person. Gosha and Lera were going to have a weekend party with friends and announce that they are expecting a child. However, the virus and panic interfered with the plans of the guys. Joining the General movement #stayhome, Gosha and Lera moved the party to a remote format, inviting everyone to a video chat. As it turned out, the virus has already affected the lives of their friends: Petya's comic book store is on the verge of bankruptcy, Sasha has switched to remote and is worried about his work, and Roma, who is skeptical of all this hype, is coughing suspiciously. From this moment on, the characters regularly meet in a video chat, and the story itself is led by a mysterious voice-over. From episode to episode, the lives of friends change. They will have to go through many difficulties. And the virus will literally experience their life and relationships to the test.
